attributes.action: All Frontline workers to be eligible for the covid vaccine
attributes.additional_details: Because at present it is only frontline health workers but there are other groups missed out who enable frontline health workers to continue to work but also provide for the public. Also teachers, childminders, nurseries and anyone who sees public face to face. They should be offered the covid vaccine in tier 2/3 as they are at risk
attributes.background: Change the wording to include anyone who has face to face contact with members of the public

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
